```{r test_170221}
require(rstarating); require(relvm)
set.seed(100)
idx <-unique(sample(1:4557,300))
cms300 <- cms2016oct_input[idx,]
x <- mstbl(cms300)
fit <- relvm(x,c("outcome_mort"))
```

